mapper.select: SELECT m.mem_name, m.mem_gender, m.mem_age, m.mem_regno1, m.mem_tel, m.mem_address1, m.mem_address2, m.mem_type, e.emp_no, e.emp_job, e.emp_hire_date, e.emp_leave_date, e.emp_leave, e.emp_licence FROM member m, emp e WHERE m.mem_type = 'MT001' AND m.mem_no = e.mem_no AND m.mem_permission = 'Y'
